remarks: The predicate "is a domain", alternate expression.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2010.)
statement:
isdmn3.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
isdmn3.2 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) $.
isdmn3.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
isdmn3.4 $e |- Z = ( GId ` G ) $.
isdmn3.5 $e |- U = ( GId ` H ) $.
isdmn3 $p |- ( R e. Dmn <-> ( R e. CRingOps /\ U =/= Z /\ A. a e. X A. b e. X ( ( a H b ) = Z -> ( a = Z \/ b = Z ) ) ) ) $.
$d H a b $.
$d R a b $.
$d X a b $.
$d Z a b $.
